name: Burning Heart
description:
In the dark cave, the stalactites are huge, and you might be hurt by sharp crystals or attacked by a ferocious bat. Try to find the spark and keep burning. 

Controls:

Space bar to jump

Information

This is a Flappy Bird-Like small game I made half year ago. I try to add more elements and gameplay to the game, and it works pretty well. The art is all drawn by my self, so if it's ugly I'm sorry about that. The music and sound effects are from FreePD.com and Freesound.org. 

Please let me know if there are any issues with the game.

Enjoy it!
